html:
axe/saw. These are tools used to cut down trees of the forest, mentioned in 10:18-19. Here the axe or saw represents Assyria in the Lord's hand. Assyria and her king are proud enough to believe that they are greater than God, who holds the tools in his hands and uses them for his divine purposes.

rod/staff. Isaiah makes it clear that the rod or staff—symbols of Assyria (10:5)— are as fragile as pieces of wood when compared to the might and power of God.
